description: Three bacon egg muffins on a white plate with a silver fork

content: "To start, preheat the oven to 350 degrees and generously grease a muffin tin with butter for easy removal later on."

description: Bacon being cooked in an air fryer with the rest of the ingredients ready

content: "Next, whisk together eggs, milk, cooked and crumbled bacon, green onions, cheddar cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl. Set it aside for now."

description: Pouring the egg mixture into the muffin tin

content: "Then, pour the egg mixture into the muffin tin, filling each cavity about 3/4 full, before sprinkling the remaining cheddar cheese on top."

description: Egg muffins in the oven baking

content: "Bake the muffins for 15-20 minutes until they look set. Remember, they will rise during baking and settle as they cool."

description: Egg muffins cooling in the tin

content: "Let the muffins cool in the pan for a few minutes before removing and serving. Easy meal prep breakfast ready to go!"
